price: Cyangwa se (ababangikanyamana b’i Maka) bavuga ko (Muhamadi) yayihimbiye (Qur’an)? Vuga uti “Niba narayihimbye icyo cyaha kimbarweho, ariko njye nta ho mpuriye n’ibyaha mukora.”
arabic: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ ٱفۡتَرَىٰهُۖ قُلۡ إِنِ ٱفۡتَرَيۡتُهُۥ فَعَلَيَّ إِجۡرَامِي وَأَنَا۠ بَرِيٓءٞ مِّمَّا تُجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: am yaqūlūna if'tarāhu qul ini if'taraytuhu faʿalayya ij'rāmī wa-anā barīon mimmā tuj'rimūna
